committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to authorize the erection of a monument given to the American people as a gift of the Kingdom of Morocco, on public grounds in the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to select the site for a monument given as a gift of Morocco in recognition of mutual friendship. Directs that the monument be erected on Federal land within the District of Columbia if: (1) the site and design of the monument is approved by the Commission of Fine Arts and the National Capital Planning Commission; and (2) erection of the monument begins within five years. Directs that U.S. funds may not be used to build the monument.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the erection of a monument given to the American people as a gift of the Kingdom of Morocco, on public grounds in the District of Columbia.
